item.value: Probably tasks will be displayed hour after sync, please add manual time after.
DESCRIBE IF;
Placing absentee bids is done with the itemsplaceBid api. On a successful attempt the response will also include an indication if the new absentee bid is also the current leading bid or not.
Bidspirit users should manager their payment methods in the portal

Removes a user payment method. NOTE! if a user used a payment method to get approval for an auction his approval would be canceled. the user should be warned about this before he proceeds with the payment method deletion. Also - a user cannot remove his payment method if he has unpaid bills.
gets a secret for stripe js api, which will allow the user to add a payment method
